name: Brawljection
description:
Important Note

This game is designed to be a standalone build, the web build is only for demo purposes. This means that some inputs might lead to unexpected behaviour (e.g. Ctrl+D opens the bookmarks on some browsers)
Please download the standalone build if you want to experience the game as it's meant to be :)

10 / 10 - Masterpiece - IGN

Brawljection is a 2.5D combat platformer but with a twist: 1 vs. 1 player combat takes place in a confined space on one surface of a cube. Unlike traditional combat games, the win condition in Brawljection is not to directly hit the other player but to lure them into harmful hazards spreaded across the map. Players have the ability to punch, dash and to grab and throw the other player.
